author: Kate Ng, Kate Ng
title: UK weather forecast: Mild, sunny days to be followed by cloud and rain on weekend
description: British public is urged to stay at home no matter what weather brings this week
content:
As the UK deals with its fourth week of lockdown, temperatures are expected to rise again to highs of 20C before bringing spells of rain closer to the weekend.
After a cold start on Wednesday morning, most of the UK will enjoy looking out their windows to se… [+3336 chars]
